div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Jan. 18, 1909. HENRIK IBSEN LODGE

body.p: The ladies of the Henrik Ibsen Lodge arranged a pleasant social for the members last Sunday evening. The entertainment consisted of singing, music, refreshments, and games.

The social concluded with a brief speech by Mr. Isak A. Bergan who reminded the male members that the interest displayed by the ladies on that evening added to the just demands on the males in the Lodge.
